title:
Simultaneous identification of the parameters in the plasticity function
  for power hardening materials : A Bayesian approach
abstract:
In this paper, we study simultaneous determination of the strain hardening
exponent, the shear modulus and the yield stress in an inverse problem. First,
we analyze the direct and the inverse problems. Then we formulate the inverse
problem in the Bayesian framework. After solving the direct problem by an
iterative approach, we propose a numerical method based on a Bayesian approach
for the numerical solution of the inverse problem. Numerical examples with
noisy data illustrate applicability and accuracy of the proposed method to some
extent.\
